description.@en: I fear that my enemies have underestimated my power while in the saddle.

data.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Every time you inflict Damage on horseback using Actions In Combat, temporarily increase your Total Damage by +1 cumulatively, lasting until you are Slain! or combat ends.
